MizoraFollowUp.synopsis: One liner for Mizora in Gather your Allies situation.

ZevlorFollowUp.synopsis: Zevlor's last conversation with the player before the battle begins. He explains that he's turned up to help, and brought some other tiefling veterans with him.
ZevlorFollowUp.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with the group outside Enter dialogue with Zevlor

AD_PlayerSummonHarperAlly.synopsis: Player summons Jaheira's Harpers into combat.

AD_ZhentSummonResponse.synopsis: Line shouted when we summon the Zhent into battle against our enemies.

AD_PlayerSummonOrthonAlly.synopsis: Player sumons Orthon if you defeated Raphael in the HoH and forced him to serve you OR accepted his deal for Endgame.

VoloFollowUp.synopsis: Volo encourages the play to move on and begin their approach to entering High Hall
VoloFollowUp.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with Volo and ShadowheartEnter dialogue with Volo

OrthonFollowUp.synopsis: Orthon has promised support in the fights to come and is trying to encourage the player to get on with it and begin the assault.

LorroakanFollowup.synopsis: One-liner following up with Lorroakan in Gather Your Allies.

AD_PlayerSummonGrenadierAlly.synopsis: Player summons Ironhand gnome grenadiers throwing bombs.

OwlbearCubFollowUp.synopsis: One-liner with owlbear after we heard the Gather Your Allies speech.

ValeriaFollowUp.synopsis: One-liner when player talks to Valeria in the Gather Your Allies building.

RolanFollowUp.synopsis: Spoke to Rolan right before the final battle.

AD_HagSummonResponse.synopsis: Hag has offered the player a greater invisibility spell to the player to assist them in the final fight. She isn't present, it's just her voice.

AD_PlayerSummonSteelWatcherAlly.synopsis: Player calls this line when they summon the Steel Watcher into battle.

AD_KeeneSummonResponse.synopsis: Line shouted when we summon Nine-Fingers into battle against our enemies in the end-game

AD_PlayerSummonVampireAlly.synopsis: PAD when you summon Vampire Lord Astarion's 'Army of the Dead', including Skeletons, Werewolves, and Shadow Creatures.

Act1GroupAllyAwards.synopsis: Volo has partially concerned himself with the injured civlian and Shadowheart is there with him. They are here to offer their respective supports to the player. This is meant to be exceedingly brief.
Act1GroupAllyAwards.how_to_trigger: 1. use oe GatherYourAllies_SetFlagsAndPlaceCharacters2. Go insidef the house3. walk to the pair of Volo and Shadowheart4. Dialogue starts automatically

ShadowheartFollowUp.synopsis: Shadowheart's call to action to the player to move on and begin their approach to entering High Hall.
ShadowheartFollowUp.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with Volo and ShadowheartEnter dialogue with Shadowheart

WulbrenFollowUp.synopsis: Wulbren's push for the player to move on and finally begin their approach to taking High Hall
WulbrenFollowUp.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with the group when entering the houseEnter dialogue with Wulbren

AD_MizoraSummonResponse.synopsis: AD spoken by Mizora when she is summoned ot help in end game.

GurFollowUp.synopsis: Ulma one-liner after END_GatherYourAllies_GatheredAllies dialogue. She's waiting for you to lead everyone into battle.

HalfarSpeakWithDead.synopsis: the final words of a Flaming Fist cleric who sought to protect the inhabitants of the house at all costs. This is meant to give the player some idea that the High Hall is currently made of swiss cheese and that a full frontal assault isn't the only option available here
HalfarSpeakWithDead.how_to_trigger: Cast Speak with Dead on Halfar  at (329, -31)

GatheredAllies.synopsis: The player's allies are gathered in a building before the High Hall combats to reach the Netherbrain. They have been warned that one of us might be an illithid. This dialogue carries that reactivity, followed by the 'and my axe' battle rally from all of our allies.
GatheredAllies.how_to_trigger: Debug book > Set Quest> Act 3 > Endgame > Master SetupRepeat the step aboveFollow follow all the steps up until choosing mindflayerEither go through the default options of go through manual setupChoose either Good or Evil AlliesProceed as normal

AD_VampireSpawnSummonResponse.synopsis: Gur hunter responds to being summoned in the final battle.

AD_PlayerSummonNightsongAlly.synopsis: Summoning Dame Aylin (Nightsong, but don't call her that)

LastMinuteTrader.synopsis: A kobold you can buy stuff from right before the big battle at the end of the game. He's small, shitty, and pure chaos.

MitchiaFollowUp.synopsis: Follow-up one-liner in the Gather Your Allies room in Endgame with one of the Unholy Assassins if we are Dark Urge. This one is a backup if Sarevok died.

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead.synopsis: A dead absolutist outside a civilian home. He is present to give the player an indication of how difficult a frontal assault may be. There may also be a subtle hint at a path the absolutist took to make it to High Hall in the first place.
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead.how_to_trigger: Cast Speak with Dead on the dead Absolutist Dwarf at (329, -31)

AD_PlayerSummonOwlbearCubAlly.synopsis: Player summons the armoured owlbear cub into battle.

AD_PlayerSummonVeteransAlly.synopsis: Player summons several tough Tiefling Veterans if Zevlor saved.

AD_PlayerSummonWatchersAlly.synopsis: Player summons the City Watch, helmed by Valeria the hollyphant into battle.

FlorrickFollowUp.synopsis: Player talks with Florrick just before final showdown.

IsobelFollowUp.synopsis: Isobel's call to action to move on and begin your approach to High Hall entry
IsobelFollowUp.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with the Goodness GroupEnter dialogue with Isobel

MolFollowUp.synopsis: One-liner follow-up with Mol after Gather Your Allies scene.

SteelWatcherFollowUp.synopsis: One-liner when player talks to Steel Watcher in Gather Your Allies building.

KeeneFollowUp.synopsis: Nine-Fingers last words  before we go into the final battle of the game

ZhentFollowUp.synopsis: The Zhent leader's last words to us before the final battle.

DammonFollowUp.synopsis: A call to the player to get on with it and begin finding an entry into High Hall
DammonFollowUp.how_to_trigger: Use oe GatherYourAllies_SetFlagsAndPlaceCharactersFinish dialogue with the Grove GroupEnter dialogue with Dammon

AD_PlayerSummonZhentarimAlly.synopsis: Player summons units from Roah/Zhents if you refused the bribe and threatened to expose her OR refused the bribe and sweet talked her into putting the Zhents on top of the Guild if they help save the city.

AD_SteelWatcherSummonResponse.synopsis: Player summons a Gondian steel watcher into battle if they saved the Gondian hostages.

RyckeFollowUp.synopsis: Follow-up one-liner in the Gather Your Allies room in Endgame with one of the Unholy Assassins if we are Dark Urge. This one is a backup if Sarevok died.

UnfortunateGnomeFollowUp.synopsis: Barcus one-liner in Gather Your Allies building.

Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards.synopsis: This group is positioned outside the house as a sort of welcome wagon to the player pointing towards the house to go in and find the player's other allies there. The participants primary purpose is to inform the player of the support they are offering. This is meant to be a very brief dialogue.
Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards.how_to_trigger: 1. use oe GatherYourAllies_SetFlagsAndPlaceCharacters2. Go to the courtyard of the house3. walk to the group of living characters in the courtyard4. Dialogue starts automatically

AD_PlayerSummonMizoraAlly.synopsis: Player summons Mizora to help in end game.

AD_PlayerSummonKeeneAlly.synopsis: Player summons Lady Nine-Fingers Keene's Personal Guard if they helped expose Roah Moonglow and funded the underbelly resistance.

AD_AstarionSummonResponse.synopsis: Vampire Lord Astarion has summoned several undead NPCs to fight for him in the final battle.

GroveGroup.synopsis: This is the group associated with the grove. They are here to inform the player of how they can help in the fight with the netherbrain and escalade to the rooftop. This should be exceedingly brief.
GroveGroup.how_to_trigger: 1. use oe GatherYourAllies_SetFlagsAndPlaceCharacters2. Go into the house3. walk to the group with tieflings and owlbear cub4. Dialogue starts automatically

ArabellaFollowUp.synopsis: Arabella one-liner before entering the final battle.

AD_PlayerSummonFlorrickAlly.synopsis: Player summons Florrick to the end game.

RolanArtilleryCine.synopsis: Player casts Rolan's Artillery or Lorroakan's Artillery (spell), which Rolan responds to by generating a massive fireball to send from Ramazith's Tower to High Hall.

HagFollowUp.synopsis: You speak to the hag at the end of the game, right before you go into the boss fight. She's there to support the player and aid them in the fight.

ViconiaFollowUp.synopsis: One-liner. The player speaks to Viconia after enlisting her help for the endgame battle.

SarevokFollowUp.synopsis: Sarevok one-liner follow-up in Gather Your Allies. Reactive to if player is DU or not.

AD_VossSummonResponse.synopsis: Voss speaks upon entering the end game combat.

AD_PlayerSummonAstarionAlly.synopsis: PAD when you summon Astarion's Gur Hunter allies, lead by the Monster Hunter Ulma.

AD_PlayerSummonRolanAlly.synopsis: Call to rolan to rain fire from the skies in the final battle.

JaheiraFollowUp.synopsis: Jaheira is gathered at the High Hall with our other allies. After a rousing speech on our behalf, she encourages us to lead everyone into battle.

MizoraFollowUp_0.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFollowUp_0.text: Enough waiting around. Let's give it Hell, shall we?

MizoraFollowUp_1.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFollowUp_1.text: Been waiting a while for this. One strike for every day I spent locked in that damn pod.

ZevlorFollowUp_0.speaker: Zevlor
ZevlorFollowUp_0.text: The survivors of Elturel stand ready for your signal - Hellriders one and all.

ZevlorFollowUp_1.speaker: Zevlor
ZevlorFollowUp_1.text: I thought the hells were behind me. But now I'm ready to walk into worse.
ZevlorFollowUp_1.context: NodeContext: Referring to himself and the other tiefling veterans he's brought to help.

AD_ZhentSummonResponse_0.speaker: Zhent Half-Elven
AD_ZhentSummonResponse_0.text: Let's show you that Zhentish steel you paid for.

VoloFollowUp_0.speaker: Volo
VoloFollowUp_0.text: Heroics first, stories later. And in that spirit, after you.

VoloFollowUp_1.speaker: Volo
VoloFollowUp_1.text: Come along now, I can't very well write the ending until you've done it!

PhasmFollowUp_0.speaker: Phasm
PhasmFollowUp_0.text: Come on - I'm hungry. Let's go rend some flesh.

PhasmFollowUp_1.speaker: Phasm
PhasmFollowUp_1.text: Aren't you glad you helped me into the city? Oh-ho, the bloodbaths I've enjoyed. And now, the greatest one of all. Let's go have some fun.

AD_OrthonSummonResponse_0.speaker: Yurgir
AD_OrthonSummonResponse_0.context: NodeContext: Battle cry after being summoned to a fight by an ally

AD_PlayerSummonViconiaAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonViconiaAlly_0.context: NodeContext: Command given during combat (summoning an ally)

OrthonFollowUp_0.speaker: Yurgir
OrthonFollowUp_0.text: Smells like violence all around... smoke, blood, tears... this will be a good hunt. Hurry on and start the attack.
OrthonFollowUp_0.context: NodeContext: Savouring the moment. Keen to make some havoc

OrthonFollowUp_1.speaker: Yurgir
OrthonFollowUp_1.text: I'm here for killing, not talking. Begin the attack.

LorroakanFollowup_0.speaker: Lorroakan
LorroakanFollowup_0.text: My my, you do take your time, don't you?

LorroakanFollowup_1.speaker: Lorroakan
LorroakanFollowup_1.text: I hope you're not expecting a demonstration. In case you hadn't noticed, we don't have time for that.

OwlbearCubFollowUp_2.speaker: Owlbear Cub
OwlbearCubFollowUp_2.text: Let's go! Let's go! Want to bite.

AD_IsobelSummonResponse_0.speaker: Isobel
AD_IsobelSummonResponse_0.text: Our Lady of Silver, hear me!

ValeriaFollowUp_0.speaker: Valeria
ValeriaFollowUp_0.text: The sooner we get this done, the sooner we can get a pint. Assuming there's an inn still standing.

ValeriaFollowUp_1.speaker: Valeria
ValeriaFollowUp_1.text: Let it not be said that Valeria does not show up when her services are required!

RolanFollowUp_0.speaker: Rolan
RolanFollowUp_0.text: You have the full force of Ramazith's Tower, and its dashing master, at your side, my friend. Let us finish this.
RolanFollowUp_0.context: NodeContext: genuine, he'd follow the player into hell itself

RolanFollowUp_1.speaker: Rolan
RolanFollowUp_1.text: My flames will be ready - simply say the word, and the skies shall rain fire.
RolanFollowUp_1.context: NodeContext: genuine, he'd follow the player into hell itself

NightsongFollowUp_0.speaker: Nightsong
NightsongFollowUp_0.text: We face the greatest evil our realm has known - and we do it together. On your word, the sword of Selûne will fall upon our foes.

AD_HagSummonResponse_0.speaker: Auntie Ethel
AD_HagSummonResponse_0.text: Here's a little help from Auntie, petal - go get 'em.

AD_KeeneSummonResponse_0.speaker: 9913c4f8-c5bf-42dd-99a2-17ab4af24ebf
AD_KeeneSummonResponse_0.context: NodeContext: Line shouted when we summon Nine-Fingers into battle against our enemies

AD_PlayerSummonHagAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonHagAlly_0.text: Auntie Ethel - it's time to hold up your end of our bargain!

AD_PlayerSummonVampireAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonVampireAlly_0.text: It's time, Astarion - we need the dead on our side!

Act1GroupAllyAwards_1.speaker: Narrator
Act1GroupAllyAwards_1.text: |Your allies have gathered to offer their support|

Act1GroupAllyAwards_0.speaker: Shadowheart
Act1GroupAllyAwards_0.text: |And my Adepts sworn to the Lady of Darkness|

ShadowheartFollowUp_0.speaker: Shadowheart
ShadowheartFollowUp_0.text: High Hall. There's nowhere else to go... This is where it all ends.
ShadowheartFollowUp_0.context: NodeContext: Steeling her nerves/one last push.In high hall (an upper keep in the city - site of the final sequence of the game)

ShadowheartFollowUp_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ShadowheartFollowUp_1.text: The sooner we kill this thing, the better.
ShadowheartFollowUp_1.context: NodeContext: Some foreboding. In the morphic pool (the cavernous lair of a netherbrain)

WulbrenFollowUp_0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
WulbrenFollowUp_0.text: Once the city is saved, we'll rebuild it better than ever. With Ironhand invention at its very foundation.

WulbrenFollowUp_1.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
WulbrenFollowUp_1.text: Prepare yourself - our arsenal will be yours to command.

GurFollowUp_0.speaker: Ulma
GurFollowUp_0.text: Now this will be a fight worth having.

GurFollowUp_1.speaker: Ulma
GurFollowUp_1.text: We stand ready to help you, as you helped us.

AD_KuoToaSummonResponse_0.speaker: Proselyte of Mahkloompah
AD_KuoToaSummonResponse_0.text: Blood for the blood god - BOOOAL!

AD_KuoToaSummonResponse_1.speaker: Proselyte of Mahkloompah
AD_KuoToaSummonResponse_1.text: Mahkloompah calls - and the murmuring deep answers!

HalfarSpeakWithDead_30.speaker: Narrator
HalfarSpeakWithDead_30.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

HalfarSpeakWithDead_32.speaker: Dead Flaming Fist
HalfarSpeakWithDead_32.text: Never... even... made it... past... gate...

HalfarSpeakWithDead_23.speaker: Player
HalfarSpeakWithDead_23.text: Did you see where the Netherbrain went?

HalfarSpeakWithDead_25.speaker: Player
HalfarSpeakWithDead_25.text: How do I get to the brain from here?

HalfarSpeakWithDead_6.speaker: Dead Flaming Fist
HalfarSpeakWithDead_6.text: Will not... make it... that way...

HalfarSpeakWithDead_27.speaker: Player
HalfarSpeakWithDead_27.text: Is there another way to reach the brain?

HalfarSpeakWithDead_7.speaker: Player
HalfarSpeakWithDead_7.text: What forces await in the courtyard?

HalfarSpeakWithDead_19.speaker: Dead Flaming Fist
HalfarSpeakWithDead_19.text: Enough... to keep... survivors... from leaving...

HalfarSpeakWithDead_18.speaker: Narrator
HalfarSpeakWithDead_18.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

HalfarSpeakWithDead_38.speaker: Narrator
HalfarSpeakWithDead_38.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

GatheredAllies_48.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_48.text: Thou art alone, but for thy friends. Didst thou not make allies?

GatheredAllies_111.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_111.text: I fear thy final confrontation will prove quite a challenge.

GatheredAllies_82.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_82.text: Hadst thou allies, the yoke of salvation may not have weighed down on thee so.

GatheredAllies_184.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_184.text: But, since thou didst not convince others to join thy cause, thou wilt face the Netherbrain's assault armed only with thine own faculties.

GatheredAllies_61.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_61.text: Let us hope they are enough, lest this plane fall to illithid ruin.

GatheredAllies_60.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_60.text: I wish thee good fortune, and good grace.

GatheredAllies_70.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_70.text: We have lost much already. And we will lose more before the day is out.
GatheredAllies_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of party walking into the Gather Your Allies room, not yet noticed by the gathered crowd. Beorn is standing on a small platform, mid-motivating-speech, addressing the crowd.

GatheredAllies_179.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_179.text: You may not have expected to be here. You may not have wanted this fight.

GatheredAllies_53.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_53.text: The soldiers around you may not be friends. In fact, they may be strangers, antagonists, enemies.

GatheredAllies_110.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_110.text: But today, they are your allies. For today, we fight a greater evil than any of you have ever known. And we cannot fight it alone.

GatheredAllies_187.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_187.text: Though it may not be your city, though it may not be your cause, you must find it within you to fight side by side. For today -
GatheredAllies_187.context: CinematicNodeContext: Beorn spots us in the crowd mid-sentence.

GatheredAllies_51.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_51.text: But even when the last soul falls, Baldur's Gate will stand. For Baldur's Gate is more than just a city.

GatheredAllies_143.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_143.text: It is more than a place of opportunity for those of mercantile spirit, more than a place of refuge for those who are lost, more than a home for friends, loved ones, and adventuring souls...

GatheredAllies_0.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_0.text: Baldur's Gate is a place where anyone can find what they need - if they're just willing to fight for it.

GatheredAllies_183.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_183.text: Today - Baldur's Gate needs us. Today, we fight for -
GatheredAllies_183.context: CinematicNodeContext: Beorn spots us in the crowd mid-sentence.

GatheredAllies_56.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_56.text: This is the one you spoke of?
GatheredAllies_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to one of the allies.

GatheredAllies_160.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
GatheredAllies_160.text: The very same. The champion we've been waiting for.

GatheredAllies_78.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
GatheredAllies_78.text: The one who will save Baldur's Gate from ruin.

GatheredAllies_34.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_34.text: *The Fist eyes you with suspicion. He was not expecting the saviour of Baldur's Gate to be a mind flayer.*

GatheredAllies_142.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_142.text: *The Fist examines your illithid ally with suspicion. He was not expecting the saviour of Baldur's Gate to be accompanied by a mind flayer.*

GatheredAllies_28.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_28.text: *The Fist examines your illithid ally with suspicion. He was not expecting the saviour of Baldur's Gate to be accompanied by a mind flayer.*

GatheredAllies_31.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_31.text: Appearances may change, but they do not mask the one within. This one I know.

GatheredAllies_133.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_133.text: This mind flayer will fight with thee. It will save thy city and thy lives.

GatheredAllies_84.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_84.text: *The Fist's suspicion softens to curiosity, his hostility melting at the recognition that there's more beyond those eyes than malice.*

GatheredAllies_68.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_68.text: *The Fist eyes your illithid ally with suspicion, softening to curiosity. His hostility melting at the recognition that there's more beyond those eyes than malice.*

GatheredAllies_164.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_164.context: CinematicNodeContext: A beat while he considers the mind flayer. Flaming Fist salute before delivering the line - feet together and bring left hand to right pec - then return to normal stance after.

GatheredAllies_42.speaker: Arabella
GatheredAllies_42.text: Never thought I'd be fighting alongside a mind flayer! But I'll fight with you. With magic.

GatheredAllies_1.speaker: Arabella
GatheredAllies_1.text: You helped me, once. I figured it's time I paid you back. With magic.

GatheredAllies_119.speaker: Dammon
GatheredAllies_119.text: I'm better at crafting steel than wielding it - your friend here is armoured and potion-fuelled and ready for battle!
GatheredAllies_119.context: NodeContext: he's talking about the owlbear cub

GatheredAllies_79.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
GatheredAllies_79.text: I have marshalled the best the Flaming Fist has to offer. We will fight to the last.

GatheredAllies_150.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
GatheredAllies_150.text: My Ironhand Gnomes brought enough explosives to level the Upper City. Just show us where we're needed.

GatheredAllies_73.speaker: Barcus Wroot
GatheredAllies_73.text: You may have changed, but my debt to you still stands. The Ironhand Gnomes' firepower is yours to command. Just show us where it's needed.

GatheredAllies_23.speaker: Barcus Wroot
GatheredAllies_23.text: You've unexpected friends, but my debt to you still stands. The Ironhand Gnomes' firepower is yours to command. Just show us where it's needed.

GatheredAllies_93.text: Your safety is of paramount importance, citizen. My services are at your disposal.

GatheredAllies_172.speaker: Isobel
GatheredAllies_172.text: The Moonmaiden's silver light is a shield in dark times. Today, it is mine to wield.

GatheredAllies_131.speaker: Nightsong
GatheredAllies_131.text: The Moonmaiden's silver light can cut as sharp as any sword. I wield it this day.

GatheredAllies_81.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
GatheredAllies_81.text: Whatever strength I have to lend, I will lend it. I will make my city proud again.

GatheredAllies_83.speaker: Wyll
GatheredAllies_83.text: Our city, father. Today, I fight in your honour.

GatheredAllies_178.speaker: Mol
GatheredAllies_178.text: Did you think I was going to let you have all the fun? Mol looks out for her friends, mind flayers included, and she'll have your back. Trust me.

GatheredAllies_166.speaker: Mol
GatheredAllies_166.text: Did you think I was going to let you have all the fun? Mol looks out for her friends, and she'll have your back. Trust me.

GatheredAllies_58.speaker: Phasm
GatheredAllies_58.text: You carried me once, friend, and now I'll carry you. Ho-ho!

GatheredAllies_88.speaker: Yurgir
GatheredAllies_88.text: You can count on me, little squid. I thirst for the hunt.

GatheredAllies_5.speaker: Lorroakan
GatheredAllies_5.text: Ramazith's arcane artillery is more than ready to demolish your enemies and mine. Give the word, and you will not be disappointed.

GatheredAllies_43.speaker: Roah Moonglow
GatheredAllies_43.text: You've bought yourself some Zhentish steel. Use it well.

GatheredAllies_170.speaker: Valeria
GatheredAllies_170.text: I'm in the mood to crack some skulls after that fuckery in the Temple of Bhaal. The City Watch will be glad to oblige me.

GatheredAllies_122.speaker: Volo
GatheredAllies_122.text: Not sure what I have to offer a mind flayer, if I'm honest, but I hope my words of encouragement and reassurance will strengthen your - ah - resolve.

GatheredAllies_16.speaker: Zevlor
GatheredAllies_16.text: The journey has been brutal, but I stand here a Hellrider once more, and I would die a proud man if I died this day.
GatheredAllies_16.context: NodeContext: Not dramatic - stating a simple fact

GatheredAllies_37.speaker: Viconia DeVir
GatheredAllies_37.text: I have gathered Lady Shar's faithful. They wait in the shadows for your order.

GatheredAllies_75.speaker: Proselyte of Mahkloompah
GatheredAllies_75.text: The blood god asks tribute. The kuo-toa answer the call!

GatheredAllies_102.speaker: Auntie Ethel
GatheredAllies_102.text: Congratulations, petal - you've got a hag on your side. And if that doesn't save your arse, nothing can.

GatheredAllies_118.speaker: Nine-Fingers Keene
GatheredAllies_118.text: I want my city back, and I've brought the toughest bastards from the Guild to get the job done.

GatheredAllies_155.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
GatheredAllies_155.text: Your Father has sent me to your aid again, Chosen one. Together we will bring new glory to His name. I will bless you in the coming battles. Let us bathe the way in blood.

GatheredAllies_22.speaker: Unholy Assassin Mitchia
GatheredAllies_22.text: The Murder Lord's own tributes will be yours to command. Use us violently, and slaughter well.

GatheredAllies_116.speaker: Astarion
GatheredAllies_116.text: My dark forces are at your command today. We have a common goal.

GatheredAllies_154.speaker: Shadowheart
GatheredAllies_154.text: I was the first Dark Justiciar in a generation, but soon we'll be legion. And today, we fight at your side.

GatheredAllies_49.speaker: Halsin
GatheredAllies_49.text: All the strength of the lands we healed flows through me. And from me, to you. No matter what form you take.

GatheredAllies_67.speaker: Halsin
GatheredAllies_67.text: All the strength of the lands we healed flows through me. And from me, to you. And whatever company you keep.

GatheredAllies_12.speaker: Halsin
GatheredAllies_12.text: All the strength of the lands we healed flows through me. And from me, to you.

GatheredAllies_165.speaker: Mizora
GatheredAllies_165.text: I wouldn't miss this for all the souls in the city. Call my name, and I'll bring the hellfire.

GatheredAllies_17.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_17.context: NodeContext: Wry, slight mock bow - she's quoting a well-known line from previous games. Should be pitched to soften the drama of a string of characters pledging their loyalty to us before / after

GatheredAllies_3.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_3.text: Glad to have you with us, and not a moment too soon.

GatheredAllies_10.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_10.text: *The air is thick with anticipation. All eyes are on you.*

GatheredAllies_32.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_32.text: *They're expecting a speech, something to stir their hearts and put fire in their bellies for the fight ahead.*

GatheredAllies_136.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_136.text: *What will a mind flayer say that could encourage them on the threshold of battle?*

GatheredAllies_169.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_169.text: Why speak at all? Infiltrate their minds, and stir whatever motivations you find within.

GatheredAllies_125.context: CinematicNodeContext: A mindmeld effect expands out from the player and ripples through the crowd, turning their consternation to cheer.

GatheredAllies_65.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_65.text: Our freedom depends on you. Fight with everything you have.

GatheredAllies_121.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_121.text: *Uncertainy ripples through them. That a mind flayer could appeal to freedom is... a confusing notion.*

GatheredAllies_29.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_29.text: Look to Wyll - the Grand Duke's words will surely inspire them.

GatheredAllies_173.speaker: Wyll
GatheredAllies_173.text: We fight for the survival of Baldur's Gate. And we will win.

GatheredAllies_6.speaker: Wyll
GatheredAllies_6.text: I cannot promise that this is the last time I will ask you to fight for your future, your lives, and your city. But I can promise you this.

GatheredAllies_38.speaker: Wyll
GatheredAllies_38.text: Whatever crisis we face, whatever danger threatens - your Grand Duke will always fight beside you. My blade is yours.

GatheredAllies_63.speaker: Wyll
GatheredAllies_63.text: Now, let's kill ourselves a Netherbrain.

GatheredAllies_33.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_33.text: Look to Minsc - the Hero of Baldur's Gate.

GatheredAllies_100.speaker: Minsc
GatheredAllies_100.text: There was a time when my hamster counted every bootprint that I left behind me, whether it was in snow, mud, or evil's backside.

GatheredAllies_50.speaker: Minsc
GatheredAllies_50.text: Boo did this because he knows the heart of Minsc, and he knew that a part of it was all those many steps behind us. In Rashemen. At home.

GatheredAllies_112.speaker: Minsc
GatheredAllies_112.text: Minsc could never count as high as Boo, so the number of steps soon became too large for him to hold in his head. Too large and too sad.

GatheredAllies_114.speaker: Minsc
GatheredAllies_114.text: But now Minsc knows the number. The number is none, because Baldur's Gate is my home, and it will not fall while Minsc and Boo still stand.

GatheredAllies_180.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_180.text: You are still full of surprises, ranger. I could not have said it better.
GatheredAllies_180.context: NodeContext: slightly choked up by Minsc's speech

GatheredAllies_41.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_41.text: But now that it is said, it is time. Swords, not words. Butt-kicking for goodness.

GatheredAllies_57.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_57.text: Look to Jaheira - she'll know what the people wish to hear.

GatheredAllies_135.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_135.text: Many of you know my name, few of you know my face. This is as it should be.

GatheredAllies_8.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_8.text: I am not a hero, I am a servant. Of nature, of balance - of life. At this moment, I serve all of you.

GatheredAllies_123.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_123.text: I buried my husband, Khalid, a hundred years ago. That wound still bleeds.

GatheredAllies_90.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_90.text: While I draw breath, I will not let this city bleed.

GatheredAllies_77.speaker: Minsc
GatheredAllies_77.text: Boo is moved to tears at the beauty of these words, Jaheira.

GatheredAllies_129.context: CinematicNodeContext: An uncomfortable silence ripples through the gathered allies, but they nod along encouragingly nonetheless.

GatheredAllies_59.speaker: The Emperor
GatheredAllies_59.text: Not the roaring validation you were looking for? Don't worry - I'll convince them.
GatheredAllies_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: A mindmeld effect expands out from the Emperor and ripples through the crowd, turning their consternation to cheer.

GatheredAllies_168.context: CinematicNodeContext: The allies cheer, emboldened and ready for battle. Preferably: shot from behind them looking at player to make them feel extra heroic.

GatheredAllies_13.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_13.text: We'll prepare ourselves - we'll be ready when you call upon us.

GatheredAllies_186.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_186.text: May your weapons sing through your enemy's throats.

GatheredAllies_126.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_126.text: *You feel a tickle of mirth in the Emperor's thoughts. If they only knew the truth.*

GatheredAllies_9.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_9.text: Embrace your courage and let it guide you through battle. Don't give in to fear!

GatheredAllies_85.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_85.text: Our freedom depends on your bravery today. You are the guardians of the city!

GatheredAllies_54.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_54.text: The outcome of this battle is not predetermined. It will depend on your will to win.

GatheredAllies_132.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_132.text: We fight to defeat the Netherbrain. We fight to take control of its Crown.

GatheredAllies_156.speaker: Player
GatheredAllies_156.text: To blood, death, and slaughter! A fight well fought, and a brain well burned.

GatheredAllies_162.speaker: Ulma
GatheredAllies_162.text: My people have never hunted a monster this large - they are eager to join the fray.

GatheredAllies_157.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
GatheredAllies_157.text: The Murder Lord's own tributes will be yours to command. Use us violently, and slaughter well.

GatheredAllies_153.speaker: Volo
GatheredAllies_153.text: I have no steel or spell to gift you, but I hope my words of encouragement and reassurance will strengthen your resolve.

GatheredAllies_182.speaker: Rolan
GatheredAllies_182.text: I made some improvements to Ramazith's arcane artillery. Give the word, and the sky falls on any who stand in your way.

GatheredAllies_145.speaker: Yurgir
GatheredAllies_145.text: You can count on me, little rabbit. And your squiddy friend. I thirst for the hunt.

GatheredAllies_91.speaker: Yurgir
GatheredAllies_91.text: You can count on me, little rabbit. I thirst for the hunt.

GatheredAllies_27.speaker: Barcus Wroot
GatheredAllies_27.text: The Ironhand Gnomes are forever in your debt. Our firepower is yours to command. Just show us where it's needed.

GatheredAllies_176.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_176.text: *The Fist eyes your illithid ally with suspicion, softening to curiosity. His hostility melting at the recognition that there's more beyond those eyes than malice.*

GatheredAllies_115.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_115.text: *The Fist eyes your illithid ally with suspicion, softening to curiosity. His hostility melting at the recognition that there's more beyond those eyes than malice.*

GatheredAllies_94.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_94.text: *The Fist eyes your illithid ally with suspicion, softening to curiosity. His hostility melting at the recognition that there's more beyond those eyes than malice.*

GatheredAllies_117.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_117.text: Observe with whom it travelleth. Friends.

GatheredAllies_189.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_189.text: *The Fist examines your illithid ally with suspicion. He was not expecting the saviour of Baldur's Gate to be accompanied by a mind flayer.*

GatheredAllies_95.speaker: Narrator
GatheredAllies_95.text: *The Fist examines your illithid ally with suspicion. He was not expecting the saviour of Baldur's Gate to be accompanied by a mind flayer.*

GatheredAllies_25.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
GatheredAllies_25.text: Well met. You are most welcome here.

GatheredAllies_21.speaker: Isobel
GatheredAllies_21.text: That is indeed the one who purged my home of a terrible evil - my father, Ketheric.

GatheredAllies_106.speaker: Isobel
GatheredAllies_106.text: There's no one I'd trust more to protect this city.

GatheredAllies_35.speaker: Nightsong
GatheredAllies_35.text: Aye - and forever will I sing the praise of the one who saved me from a century of horrors.

GatheredAllies_149.speaker: Nightsong
GatheredAllies_149.text: This hero and no other can save this city from destruction. Of this I am certain.

GatheredAllies_113.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_113.text: The very same. The one who comes to save the city.

GatheredAllies_96.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_96.text: They will lay the final stitch on the fate of Baldur's Gate.

GatheredAllies_64.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_64.text: I said only kind and flowery things - Harper's honour.
GatheredAllies_64.context: NodeContext: Wry, to player - another character has dramatically asked if we're the one Jaheria has told everyone about

GatheredAllies_80.speaker: Jaheira
GatheredAllies_80.text: Yes, this is the one - and just in time. There's a city to be saved.
GatheredAllies_80.context: NodeContext: Turning back to guard, confirming we're the one everyone's been waiting for

GatheredAllies_148.speaker: Halsin
GatheredAllies_148.text: The very same. They saved something very precious to me from the grips of the shadow curse.

GatheredAllies_87.speaker: Halsin
GatheredAllies_87.text: Now they stand poised to save the city. I can think of no champion more worthy.

GatheredAllies_92.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_92.text: Thou art alone. Didst thou not make allies?

GatheredAllies_146.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_146.text: Thou art not alone, but thy numbers are few.

GatheredAllies_45.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_45.text: Yet it could be argued that excellence outweighs multitude where battle is concerned.

GatheredAllies_138.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_138.text: Let us hope they are enough, lest this plane fall to illithid ruin.

GatheredAllies_74.speaker: Withers
GatheredAllies_74.text: I wish thee good fortune, and good grace.

AD_HarperSummonResponse_0.speaker: Harper Archer
AD_HarperSummonResponse_0.text: We fight for the fate of the city.

AD_VampireSpawnSummonResponse_0.speaker: c5b4bd6d-4dca-4f31-9e8b-5b750f034957
AD_VampireSpawnSummonResponse_0.text: Forward, hunters! Cleanse the land of these monsters!

AD_ShadowheartSummonResponse_0.speaker: Shadowheart
AD_ShadowheartSummonResponse_0.context: NodeContext: Joining battle after being summoned by an ally (SH is the leader of the Shar cult in this case)

AD_PlayerSummonNightsongAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonNightsongAlly_0.text: Dame Aylin! Lend me your sword!

BeornFollowUp_0.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
BeornFollowUp_0.text: We're ready to lay down our lives if you are.

BeornFollowUp_1.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
BeornFollowUp_1.text: I'm glad you're here. The illithid, too. Though it'll take some getting used to.

BeornFollowUp_2.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
BeornFollowUp_2.text: Your appearance is going to take some getting used to, but I'm glad you're here.

BeornFollowUp_3.speaker: Beorn Wunterbrood
BeornFollowUp_3.text: Go on ahead. We'll be ready when you need us.

LastMinuteTrader_12.speaker: Koll the Red
LastMinuteTrader_12.text: Bodies, bloods - this is the dream! Knew I was smarts to sneaks in. The skelly boy said I could stay if I solds ya stuff. So hurry up - BUY, BUY BUY.

LastMinuteTrader_9.speaker: Koll the Red
LastMinuteTrader_9.text: Wuargh! You're a bit of a big'un aren't ya? Pleased to make your acquaintance, my scaly liege. Er... buy buy buy?
LastMinuteTrader_9.context: NodeContext: a little bit nervous and deferential to see that player is dragonborn

LastMinuteTrader_10.speaker: Player
LastMinuteTrader_10.text: I'm no 'liege' any longer, little one. I'm just scaly.

LastMinuteTrader_7.speaker: Koll the Red
LastMinuteTrader_7.text: Oi. Don't be rude. I may be small but I can carry more than my weight in goodly goods so BUY SOMETHING or move on.

LastMinuteTrader_5.speaker: Player
LastMinuteTrader_5.text: You do know there's about to be a huge battle, right?

LastMinuteTrader_4.speaker: Koll the Red
LastMinuteTrader_4.text: Really?! Argh, don't you go getting chopped up! I need customers.

LastMinuteTrader_6.speaker: Player
LastMinuteTrader_6.text: Let me see what you have.

LastMinuteTrader_11.speaker: Koll the Red
LastMinuteTrader_11.text: Don't go dying, or I'll be REAL mads.

MitchiaFollowUp_0.speaker: Unholy Assassin Mitchia
MitchiaFollowUp_0.text: Bodies upon bodies filled with unspilt blood. Lead us into slaughter, Chosen one. We shall do unholy service in your Father's name.

MitchiaFollowUp_1.speaker: Unholy Assassin Mitchia
MitchiaFollowUp_1.text: Such opportunity, such butchery awaits us - it is a blessed day for Bhaal and all his loyal slaughterers.

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_15.speaker: Narrator
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_15.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_17.speaker: Dead Cultist
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_17.text: Lewis... Morell... loyal servant... of the... Absolute...

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_31.speaker: Dead Cultist
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_31.text: Felled... on the threshold... of victory...

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_35.speaker: Player
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_35.text: Where were these sewers you came through?

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_28.speaker: Player
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_28.text: How many more cultists are there?

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_20.speaker: Dead Cultist
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_20.text: Many came... few left... men slaughtered...

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_1.speaker: Player
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_1.text: Who were you before you became a slave to the Absolute?

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_11.speaker: Dead Cultist
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_11.text: Soon to lose... job... to... Steel Watch...

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_18.speaker: Player
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_18.text: Why did you join the Absolute's forces?

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_23.speaker: Player
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_23.text: And in the end, did you find your purpose with the Absolute?

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_2.speaker: Dead Cultist
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_2.text: Your... failure... gives... my death... meaning...

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_27.speaker: Narrator
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_27.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_26.speaker: Narrator
AbsolutistSpeakWithDead_26.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

AD_WatcherSummonResponse_0.speaker: Watcher Guardian
AD_WatcherSummonResponse_0.text: The City Watch will join you!

HalsinFollowUp_0.speaker: Halsin
HalsinFollowUp_0.text: Onwards. There is no reason to linger here.

AD_PlayerSummonOwlbearCubAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonOwlbearCubAlly_0.text: Time to bite, my owlbear friend!

AD_PlayerSummonVeteransAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonVeteransAlly_0.text: Veterans of the Hells - to arms!

AD_PlayerSummonShadowheartAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonShadowheartAlly_0.context: NodeContext: Combat rally cry (summoning ally) GROUP_Player line. Does not need to be recorded by S_Player_Shadowheart

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_0.text: |And the Ironhands grenades. Speaking of I have a barrel of Rune Powder if you'd like. End of Baldur's gate seems appropriate time to use such quantities of the precious|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_19.speaker: Player
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_19.text: |I'll take you up on that offer!|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_12.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_12.text: |Fantastic! Here's the Barrel. Just be sure to be clear when it goes off.|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_2.speaker: Player
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_2.text: |I'll pass. Trying to keep a low profile going in. Thanks though|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_31.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_31.text: |Your loss. You could have wielded the power to level mountains|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_15.speaker: Narrator
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_15.text: |It's a group of your recent friends|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_11.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_11.text: |And the Ironhands grenades. Speaking of I have a barrel of Rune Powder if you'd like. End of Baldur's gate seems appropriate time to use such quantities of the precious|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_30.speaker: Player
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_30.text: |I'll take you up on that offer!|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_9.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_9.text: |Fantastic! Here's the Barrel. Just be sure to be clear when it goes off.|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_21.speaker: Player
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_21.text: |I'll pass. Trying to keep a low profile going in. Thanks though|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_34.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_34.text: |Your loss. You could have wielded the power to level mountains|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_10.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_10.text: |And the Ironhands grenades. Speaking of I have a barrel of Rune Powder if you'd like. End of Baldur's gate seems appropriate time to use such quantities of the precious|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_14.speaker: Player
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_14.text: |I'll take you up on that offer!|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_5.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_5.text: |Fantastic! Here's the Barrel. Just be sure to be clear when it goes off.|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_18.speaker: Player
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_18.text: |I'll pass. Trying to keep a low profile going in. Thanks though|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_4.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_4.text: |Your loss. You could have wielded the power to level mountains|

Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_25.speaker: Zevlor
Wulbren_Act3AndZevlorGroup_25.text: |I'm here to offer my Hellriders to you in this apocalypse|

FlorrickFollowUp_0.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
FlorrickFollowUp_0.text: My weapon is yours - you need only call.

FlorrickFollowUp_1.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
FlorrickFollowUp_1.text: Today, we take back the city!

IsobelFollowUp_0.speaker: Isobel
IsobelFollowUp_0.text: I don't fear death. But this is not our day to die.

IsobelFollowUp_1.speaker: Isobel
IsobelFollowUp_1.text: Press on. This will all be over soon. And then - my gods, then I'm having something very strong indeed.

MolFollowUp_0.speaker: Mol
MolFollowUp_0.text: I knew I was in for something exciting from the moment we first met! Don't disappoint me now!

MolFollowUp_1.speaker: Mol
MolFollowUp_1.text: You really don't want to face that brain, do you? Scared? Don't be. I've got you.

WithersFollowUp_17.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_17.text: Thou art at the threshold of thy destiny. Thou needst only to take thy last steps to cross it.

WithersFollowUp_33.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_33.text: Beyond mortal realms, there doth exist an amalgamation of spirits akin to thine own, ensnared by the treacherous cult of the Absolute, felled in its name.

WithersFollowUp_23.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_23.text: They bear great discontentment with their destiny.

WithersFollowUp_0.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_0.text: For a mere pittance of coin, I might summon the worthiest among them to lend aid to thy undertaking.

WithersFollowUp_8.speaker: Player
WithersFollowUp_8.text: Will these hirelings be joining me willingly?

WithersFollowUp_32.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_32.text: Most willingly, forsooth. Their passions doth run deep for what hath been wrought upon them.

WithersFollowUp_2.speaker: Player
WithersFollowUp_2.text: Do you think I can trust these cultists?

WithersFollowUp_9.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_9.text: Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind. My services are all that I can proffer thee. What thou wilt do with them is for thee to undertake.

WithersFollowUp_27.speaker: Player
WithersFollowUp_27.text: I would like to recruit a hireling. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_3_01f129ea-b4dc-44b6-8154-9a948f876a82])

WithersFollowUp_20.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_20.text: Patience. Thy colleague still peruses my ledger.

WithersFollowUp_30.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_30.text: Thou canst not hire allies. I must speak with thy leader.

WithersFollowUp_29.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_29.text: No. Thy coinpurse is near empty.

WithersFollowUp_18.speaker: Player
WithersFollowUp_18.text: I would like to dismiss a hireling.

WithersFollowUp_4.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_4.text: There is no one to dismiss.

WithersFollowUp_11.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_11.text: Only thy leader may banish hirelings.

WithersFollowUp_35.speaker: Withers
WithersFollowUp_35.text: If thou art ready, proceed to seal fate's image with thy final stitch.

SteelWatcherFollowUp_0.text: We will be ready, friend of Gond. Lead on.

SteelWatcherFollowUp_1.text: The gift of Gond will be with you, friend of Gondians. As will we.

AD_NightsongSummonResponse_0.speaker: Nightsong
AD_NightsongSummonResponse_0.text: Moon above and stars beside her!

KeeneFollowUp_0.speaker: Nine-Fingers Keene
KeeneFollowUp_0.text: Come on. Speeches are done - all that's left is the doing.
KeeneFollowUp_0.context: NodeContext: Nine-Fingers last words  before we go into the final battle of the game. Not gruff or unkind - just confident and matter of fact.

ZhentFollowUp_0.speaker: Roah Moonglow
ZhentFollowUp_0.text: You've bought yourself some Zhentish steel. Only fair that you get to see it in action.
ZhentFollowUp_0.context: NodeContext: Smiling, confident - her last words to us before we go into battle.

DammonFollowUp_0.speaker: Dammon
DammonFollowUp_0.text: Who knew we'd make it this far? I'm behind you. Or wherever you need me to be, really. Lead on.

DammonFollowUp_2.speaker: Dammon
DammonFollowUp_2.text: Karlach. Look at you. Still hotter than the Hells themselves and ready to save the world. Go on - I'll be there when the time comes.

DammonFollowUp_3.speaker: Dammon
DammonFollowUp_3.text: Even I was surprised by how well the owlbear would take to the potions. Just look at it! Glorious little creature. Well, not so little anymore.

RyckeFollowUp_0.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
RyckeFollowUp_0.text: Lead us on, my unholy liege, to slaughter on a scale the world has never seen.

RyckeFollowUp_1.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
RyckeFollowUp_1.text: Such misery awaits us. My fingers yearn to drag themselves through bloody flesh and make morsels of the masses in Bhaal's name.
RyckeFollowUp_1.context: NodeContext: 'misery' said with delight - this is a good thing, murder is the dream

UnfortunateGnomeFollowUp_0.speaker: Barcus Wroot
UnfortunateGnomeFollowUp_0.text: Never thought our first meeting would land us here, of all places, but here we are.

UnfortunateGnomeFollowUp_1.speaker: Barcus Wroot
UnfortunateGnomeFollowUp_1.text: I'm ready to pay back my debts to you, friend. All of them.

AD_ViconiaSummonResponse_0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_ViconiaSummonResponse_0.context: NodeContext: 'l-ill allure' - battle cry after being summoned to a fight by an ally

Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_11.speaker: Narrator
Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_11.text: |It's a group of your recent friends|

Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_7.speaker: Zevlor
Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_7.text: |I'm here to offer my Hellriders to you in this apocalypse|

Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_10.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_10.text: |And the Ironhands grenades. Speaking of I have a barrel of Rune Powder if you'd like. End of Baldur's gate seems appropriate time to use such quantities of the precious|

Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_1.speaker: Player
Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_1.text: |I'll take you up on that offer!|

Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_2.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_2.text: |Fantastic! Here's the Barrel. Just be sure to be clear when it goes off.|

Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_12.speaker: Player
Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_12.text: |I'll pass. Trying to keep a low profile going in. Thanks though|

Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_17.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
Act3AndZevlorGroupAllyAwards_17.text: |Your loss. You could have wielded the power to level mountains|

AD_PlayerSummonMizoraAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonMizoraAlly_0.text: Time to do your part, Mizora!

AD_PlayerSummonKeeneAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonKeeneAlly_0.text: Lady Keene - we need your people. NOW.

AD_AstarionSummonResponse_0.speaker: Astarion
AD_AstarionSummonResponse_0.text: My children! What a beautiful sight.

GroveGroup_1.speaker: Dammon
GroveGroup_1.text: |And this drugged up armored owlbear cub|

ArabellaFollowUp_0.speaker: Arabella
ArabellaFollowUp_0.text: You lot have been good to me. Now let's show this brain who's boss.

ArabellaFollowUp_1.speaker: Arabella
ArabellaFollowUp_1.text: I wouldn't be here without you. It's time I repaid the favour.

AD_PlayerSummonFlorrickAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonFlorrickAlly_0.text: Florrick, where in the hells are you?
AD_PlayerSummonFlorrickAlly_0.context: NodeContext: Calling out to Counsellor Florrick for aid.

RolanArtilleryCine_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rolan, standing atop Ramazith's Tower, receives the magic signal from the player casting the spell, fixes his face with resolve, and begins the casting of a massive Fireball.

RolanArtilleryCine_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rolan finishes the casting of the firebal and sends it hurling towards the High Hall.

RolanArtilleryCine_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The fireball comes arching towards us, just in time to cut back to gameplay (before it strikes),

HagFollowUp_0.speaker: Auntie Ethel
HagFollowUp_0.text: Can't stay away from me, petal? I don't blame you. But you've got a battle to win, and you won't do it looking at me with the coaxing eyes of a dying calf.

HagFollowUp_1.speaker: Auntie Ethel
HagFollowUp_1.text: See - I showed up, didn't I? Auntie Ethel keeps her word. Now slap on your gladrags and put on a show, petal. It's time for blood!
HagFollowUp_1.context: NodeContext: ethel has shown up to support the player in the final fight. Eager for a bloody fight!

LordAstarionFollowUp_0.speaker: Astarion
LordAstarionFollowUp_0.text: Now that I can enjoy the sun without needing their parasite, the mind flayers serve no further purpose.

LordAstarionFollowUp_1.speaker: Astarion
LordAstarionFollowUp_1.text: It's time to exterminate them. To cleanse my city of their filth.

ViconiaFollowUp_0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaFollowUp_0.text: Enough talk. There is a battle to be won.

SarevokFollowUp_0.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
SarevokFollowUp_0.text: Slaughter well, Bhaalspawn. Set a deluge of blood upon this land.

SarevokFollowUp_1.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
SarevokFollowUp_1.text: To your end, or the world's, Chosen of Bhaal.

SarevokFollowUp_2.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
SarevokFollowUp_2.text: Slaughter well, in the name of Bhaal.

SarevokFollowUp_3.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
SarevokFollowUp_3.text: There is blood to be spilled, and corpses to be wrought. Do not test Bhaal's patience. Go forth and make murder.

AD_VossSummonResponse_0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossSummonResponse_0.context: NodeContext: Mother Gith hear me! YISK GITH-kah TAHV-key KRAHSHT!

AD_PlayerSummonAstarionAlly_0.speaker: Player
AD_PlayerSummonAstarionAlly_0.text: Ulma, gather your hunters! It's time to slay some monsters.

KuoToaFollowUp_0.speaker: Proselyte of Mahkloompah
KuoToaFollowUp_0.text: Our blood to fill the great god's oceans! Our bones to build the temple in the deep!

KuoToaFollowUp_1.speaker: Proselyte of Mahkloompah
KuoToaFollowUp_1.text: We come with the tide - to kill in the great god's name!

RavengardFollowUp_0.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
RavengardFollowUp_0.text: Have courage, my friend. Your victory is assured.

JaheiraFollowUp_0.speaker: Jaheira
JaheiraFollowUp_0.text: Oh, don't look at me. This is your charge to lead - and no better one to do it.
JaheiraFollowUp_0.context: NodeContext: Amused, wry - but genuine faith coming through
